metadata.name: Embrace Your Mortality
metadata.description:
This art piece is an exploration of mortality, and honours the fragility of life. It expresses the idea that death is part of a universal cycle, to be accepted rather than feared.  The simple colour palette creates an atmosphere of solemn contemplation, while the intricate details evoke the beauty and complexity of life and its inevitable end.

Hand Drawn Digital Illustration
2480 x 3508
